name: Cheerful Chao Community
description:
Cheerful Chao Community began as an idea to replicate the Chao Garden from Sonic Adventure 2, except featuring all of the features you love from the original game such as: Fully Pixel-Art Chao, all possible evolutions, and Racing (future stretch goal).

The current version is an extremely early demo submitted to the Stevens Game Development Club's Winter Jam III.  

Updates will be posted HERE on this page!
